title: Syncrobit Helium (HNT) Miner
description: IoT: Hardware and Software Development for Helium (HNT) mining device. Complete embedded system design, firmware, and cloud integration for Syncrobit.
challenge: Designing a reliable, low-power Helium miner with secure wireless connectivity and robust cloud integration.
solution: Developed custom PCB, firmware, and a secure cloud dashboard. Integrated LoRaWAN and BLE for device management and data reporting.
detail:
The Syncrobit Helium Miner project involved complete embedded system design for a next-generation Helium (HNT) mining device. Our team engineered the hardware, developed custom firmware, and integrated secure cloud connectivity. The device features robust wireless communication, low power consumption, and a user-friendly interface for device management. The project showcases our expertise in IoT, PCB design, and end-to-end product development.

![Embedded System Design syncrob.it Helium Miner](/portfolio/printedBoard-768x512.jpg)

title: Temperature and Humidity Monitoring System
description: IoT: End-to-end hardware and software for real-time temperature and humidity monitoring. Custom PCB, sensor integration, and cloud dashboard.
challenge: Accurate, real-time monitoring in harsh industrial environments with remote data access.
solution: Designed ruggedized sensor nodes, implemented wireless data transmission, and built a web dashboard for analytics.
detail:
This project delivered a robust temperature and humidity monitoring system for industrial environments. We designed custom PCBs using the nRF52840 platform, integrated high-accuracy sensors, and developed firmware for reliable wireless data transmission. The system includes a cloud dashboard for real-time analytics and alerting. Our solution ensures precise monitoring even in harsh conditions.

![Temperature and Humidity Monitoring System top](/portfolio/nrf52840_Top-Large-768x539.png)

title: Website Samples
description: Web Development: Portfolio of modern, responsive websites and web applications built for clients in various industries.
challenge: Delivering high-performance, visually appealing, and mobile-friendly websites for diverse business needs.
solution: Developed custom themes, integrated CMS solutions, and optimized for SEO and speed.
detail:
A showcase of modern, responsive websites and web applications built for clients in various industries. Our web development portfolio demonstrates expertise in UI/UX design, performance optimization, and seamless CMS integration. Each project is tailored to client needs, ensuring both functionality and visual appeal.

![botiga-free-woocommerce-wordpress-theme-1180x664](/portfolio/botiga-free-woocommerce-wordpress-theme-1180x664-1.jpg)

title: RK3588 Based High Speed IO Board
description: Hardware Development: High-speed IO board based on RK3588 SoC. Designed for industrial and research applications requiring fast data acquisition.
challenge: Achieving high data throughput and signal integrity in a compact form factor.
solution: Engineered multi-layer PCB, implemented high-speed interfaces, and validated with lab testing.
detail:
The RK3588 Based High Speed IO Board was developed for research and industrial applications requiring fast data acquisition. Our team engineered a multi-layer PCB with high-speed interfaces, ensuring signal integrity and reliability. The board was validated through extensive lab testing and is designed for scalability and performance.

![RK3588 Based High Speed IO Board](/portfolio/top-1024x697.png)

title: BLE Based Smart Putter Device
description: Hardware Development: Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) enabled smart golf putter for real-time swing analysis and feedback.
challenge: Integrating BLE electronics into a golf putter without affecting weight or balance.
solution: Designed miniaturized electronics, custom firmware, and a mobile app for swing data visualization.
detail:
The BLE Based Smart Putter Device project involved designing a Bluetooth-enabled golf putter for real-time swing analysis. We engineered miniaturized electronics, developed custom firmware, and created a mobile app for data visualization. The device provides golfers with actionable insights while maintaining the traditional feel of a putter.

![BLE Based Smart Putter Device](/portfolio/vertex-main.jpg)

title: Self Scanning Solution
description: Hardware Development and Programming: Self-service scanning solution for retail and logistics. Embedded software, custom hardware, and seamless integration.
challenge: Building a user-friendly, reliable self-scanning device for high-traffic retail environments.
solution: Developed ergonomic hardware, robust embedded software, and integrated with POS systems.
detail:
Embeddronics partnered with scangoroo to develop a revolutionary self-scanning solution for retail. We designed the hardware for the scangoroo handle, integrating a scanner, scale, and interactive display. The device features robust construction, ergonomic design, and seamless integration with retail systems. Our work empowers a faster, cashless, and more convenient shopping experience.

![Esp32 Scangoroo self-scanning solution](/portfolio/slide1.jpg)
